flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Many people like camping or tailgating. But many of those people hate the cold! Unfortunately tent heaters cost a bundle. But this guide will tell you how to make one yourself for a very affordable cost if at all. You will need a piece of ply wood about 6" wide and 30" long, a toggle switch, a small fan of any kind, winding wire (enameled), normal wire, and some batteries. And put it in a cold room or tent.
